name: Travel Agencies and Tour Operators
description:
Travel agencies that primarily provide travel information and booking
services. Such merchants act as agents on behalf of travelers in
booking and ticketing air, land, or sea transportation or lodging
accommodations, including plane flights, bus tours, sea cruises, car
rentals, rail transportation, and lodging. Also includes tour operators
that arrange and assemble tours for sale through a travel agent or
directly to the consumer. A traveler may also book such tour
packages and excursions through a hotel concierge or ticket office.
Examples include bus charters and tour bus operators.
